title: Installation issue: libev

labels.name: download-error
labels.description: The package source cannot be downloaded

body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue
spack install libev

```console
# spack install libev
==> Installing libev
==> Searching for binary cache of libev
==> Finding buildcaches in /root/.mirror/build_cache
==> No binary for libev found: installing from source
==> Fetching file:///root/.mirror/libev/libev-4.24.tar.gz
curl: (37) Couldn't open file /root/.mirror/libev/libev-4.24.tar.gz
==> Fetching from file:///root/.mirror/libev/libev-4.24.tar.gz failed.
==> Fetching file:///root/.mirror/_source-cache/archive/97/973593d3479abdf657674a55afe5f78624b0e440614e2b8cb3a07f16d4d7f821.tar.gz
curl: (37) Couldn't open file /root/.mirror/_source-cache/archive/97/973593d3479abdf657674a55afe5f78624b0e440614e2b8cb3a07f16d4d7f821.tar.gz
==> Fetching from file:///root/.mirror/_source-cache/archive/97/973593d3479abdf657674a55afe5f78624b0e440614e2b8cb3a07f16d4d7f821.tar.gz failed.
==> Fetching http://dist.schmorp.de/libev/libev-4.24.tar.gz

curl: (7) Failed connect to dist.schmorp.de:80; Connection timed out
==> Fetching from http://dist.schmorp.de/libev/libev-4.24.tar.gz failed.
==> Fetching http://dist.schmorp.de/libev/libev-4.24.tar.gz

curl: (7) Failed connect to dist.schmorp.de:80; Connection timed out
==> Fetching from http://dist.schmorp.de/libev/libev-4.24.tar.gz failed.
==> Error: FetchError: All fetchers failed for spack-stage-libev-4.24-5iy74m2dguwr6vyixf2dwqe2i7fr7kl5

/home/xiaojun/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py:1079, in do_fetch:
       1076                raise FetchError("Will not fetch %s" %
       1077                                 self.spec.format('{name}{@version}'), ck_msg)
       1078
  >>   1079        self.stage.create()
       1080        self.stage.fetch(mirror_only)
       1081        self._fetch_time = time.time() - start_time
       1082
```
